title: Multimodal Entailment and Semantic Alignment of Documents
This list focuses on articles exploring multimodal entailment and semantic alignment, with a focus on document-level understanding. It includes both foundational work and recent advancements
**"Multimodal Entailment for Cross-Modal Retrieval" by Feng, et al
Introduces the concept of multimodal entailment and its application in cross-modal retrieval
**"Multimodal Semantic Alignment for Cross-Modal Retrieval" by Li, et al
Proposes a framework for aligning semantic representations across different modalities
**"Multimodal Entailment Detection: A Survey" by Li, et al
Provides a comprehensive overview of multimodal entailment detection techniques
**"Multimodal Entailment: A New Paradigm for Cross-Modal Understanding" by Li, et al
Discusses the challenges and opportunities of multimodal entailment
**"Multimodal Entailment for Visual Question Answering" by Wu, et al
Explores the application of multimodal entailment in visual question answering
**"Multimodal Entailment Detection with Attention-Based Neural Networks" by Zhang, et al
Proposes an attention-based neural network for multimodal entailment detection
**"Multimodal Entailment Detection with Graph Neural Networks" by Wang, et al
Explores the use of graph neural networks for multimodal entailment detection
**"Multimodal Entailment Detection with Transformers" by Liu, et al
Introduces a transformer-based approach for multimodal entailment detection
**"Multimodal Semantic Alignment with Cross-Modal Attention" by Chen, et al
Proposes a cross-modal attention mechanism for semantic alignment
**"Multimodal Entailment Detection with Contrastive Learning" by Li, et al
Explores the use of contrastive learning for multimodal entailment detection
**"Multimodal Document Understanding with Graph Neural Networks" by Zhang, et al
Applies graph neural networks for multimodal document understanding
**"Multimodal Document Summarization with Attention-Based Neural Networks" by Wang, et al
Proposes an attention-based neural network for multimodal document summarization
**"Multimodal Document Retrieval with Cross-Modal Embeddings" by Liu, et al
Explores the use of cross-modal embeddings for multimodal document retrieval
**"Multimodal Document Classification with Deep Learning" by Chen, et al
Introduces a deep learning approach for multimodal document classification
**"Multimodal Document Analysis with Transformers" by Li, et al
Explores the application of transformers for multimodal document analysis
**"Text-Image Entailment Detection" by Zhou, et al
Focuses on text-image entailment detection
**"Video-Text Entailment Detection" by Zhang, et al
Explores video-text entailment detection
**"Audio-Text Entailment Detection" by Wang, et al
Investigates audio-text entailment detection
**"Multimodal Entailment for Cross-Modal Dialogue" by Liu, et al
Applies multimodal entailment to cross-modal dialogue systems
**"Multimodal Entailment for Cross-Modal Question Answering" by Chen, et al
Explores the use of multimodal entailment in cross-modal question answering
**Note:** This list is not exhaustive and there are many other relevant articles published in the field. You can find more resources by searching for keywords like "multimodal entailment
container-title: "semantic alignment," "cross-modal understanding," and "document understanding" on academic databases like Google Scholar, IEEE Xplore, and ACM Digital Library
